title: Tony-winning Irish playwright Brian Friel dies at 86
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
Irish authorities say Brian Friel, the Tony Award-winning playwright who created "Dancing at Lughnasa" and more than 30 other plays, has die...
